name: open-directory
title: Directory Browser
description: Browse and navigate directories with a split-view interface showing file details
author: ruifeng_zhang

commands.name: open
commands.title: Open Directory
commands.description: Browse and open directories with customizable interface

preferences.name: defaultDirectory
preferences.title: Default Directory
preferences.description: The default directory path to use when opening the extension

preferences.name: commandTitle
preferences.title: Command Title
preferences.description: Customize how the command appears in Raycast (e.g., 'Open Directory', 'Browse Files', 'Directory Explorer')

preferences.name: showHiddenFiles
preferences.title: Show Hidden Files
preferences.description: Show files and folders that start with a dot (hidden files)
preferences.label: Show Hidden Files

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
